activation-cgu: By activating your account, you accept the terms and conditions of use
auth-error-invalid_client: This version of the application ({{version}}) is obsolete, please update it.
auth-error-invalid_grant: This version of the application ({{version}}) is obsolete, please update it.
auth-error-blocked_user: The administrator of your establishment has blocked your access to your educational network.
auth-error-blocked_type: We temporarily restrict access to the educational social network to certain user profiles. Please try again later.
auth-error-too_load: Due to the large number of connections, we must temporarily restrict access to the service. Try again in a few minutes.
auth-error-platform_unavailable: Your educational network is temporarily unavailable, our team is doing its utmost to resolve these disturbances as quickly as possible.
auth-error-unknown_denied: Unable to log in. Incorrect server response ({{errorcode}}). Please try again or contact support.
auth-error-unknown_response: Unable to log in. Incorrect server response ({{errorcode}}). Please try again or contact support.
auth-error-network_error: Unable to log in, try again or check your internet connection.
auth-error-parse_error: Unable to log in. Incorrect server response ({{errorcode}}). Please try again or contact support.
auth-error-bad_response: Unable to log in. Incorrect server response ({{errorcode}}). Please try again or contact support.
auth-error-not_initilized: Unable to log in ({{errorcode}}). Please try again or contact support.
auth-error-runtime_error: Unable to log in ({{errorcode}}). Please try again or contact support.
auth-error-firebase_error: Unable to log in: error initializing notifications on your device.
auth-error-not_premium: You cannot log in because your school subscription plan does not include the application.
blog-emptyScreenText: You don’t have any shared blogs. To publish a post, you’ll need to first create a blog and share it from the web version of your virtual learning environment.
blog-emptyScreenTitle: It’s a bit quiet around here...
change-password-errorLoading: We were not able to upload the data needed to change your password. Please try again later.
common-VersionContent: A new version ({{version}}) is available on the Play Store if you would like to update your app.
common-VersionContentMandatory: A new version ({{version}}) is available on the Play Store if you would like to update your app. Please update your application.
common-VersionTitle: New version on the Play Store
conversation-emptyScreenText: With Mailbox, start communicating with the other members of your network.
createPost-submitSuccess: Your post has been submitted. It will be published once the blog manager approves it.
download-error-unsupportedFileType: The format of your file is not recognized by your device
federatedAccount-instructions:
If you use a federated account to access your collaborative social network, you have to generate a temporary password from My Account page.

This is necessary only on your first authentication to the mobile app.

To access My Account page, log in from your web browser by clicking the button below.
files.too.large: Not enough space to save files
forgot-invalid-mail: User unknown or no email address provided for this user. Please contact your VLE administrator.
forgot-no-match: User unknown or no email address provided for this user. Please contact your VLE administrator.
homework-emptyScreenText: Soon, you'll be able to see all the activities you need to do in this digital notebook. Cool, huh?
loadingFailedMessage: Loading failed. Please check your Internet connection.
myapp-emptyScreenText: It looks like you do not have access to any apps...
notifications-readRecent: You have read your last {{notificationsLimit}} notifications
owner-emptyScreenText: Bienvenue dans votre espace documentaire, le cloud qui vous permet de stocker en ligne toutes vos ressources.
owner-emptyScreenTitle: Vous n’avez pas encore de documents...
ProfileChangeLoginError: This username is already in use.
ProfileChangeSuccess: Your information has been successfully updated.
ProfileInvalidInformation: Some fields are invalid. Please check your information and correct any errors before saving.
protected-emptyScreenText: Vous avez ajouté une dizaine de photos directement dans votre Blog et voulez les réutiliser ? Pas de soucis ! Retrouverez les, bien rangées, juste ici.
protected-emptyScreenTitle: Oups, il n’y a rien sur l’étagère…
schoolbook-already-confirmed: You have confirmed that you have read this message
schoolbook-back-without-ack-confirm: Would you like to close this screen without confirming that you’ve read the message?
schoolbook-must-read: A parent must read this message!
share-emptyScreenText: Dans cet espace, retrouvez tous les documents que vous avez partagés aux autres, mais aussi les documents auxquels on vous a donné accès.Eh oui ! C'est beau d'échanger.
share-emptyScreenTitle: Oups, il n’y a rien sur l’étagère…
timeline-emptyScreenText: All quiet on the Western front. Are you familiar with the saying "the calm before the storm"?
timeline-emptyScreenTitle: No sightings yet. Is there anybody out there?
timeline-endOfFeed: You have read your last {{nb}} notifications
trash-emptyScreenText: Euh… Vous cherchez quoi ? Votre corbeille est vide.
workspace-uploadSuccessful: The document has been successfully imported
workspace-quota-overflowText: Your storage space is full. You cannot upload more files.
zimbra-missing-receiver: This message must contain at least one recipient
